FuncDef:
The nvme enable command enables the NVMe packet parsing function.
The undo nvme enable command disables the NVMe packet parsing function. The nvme enable command enables the NVMe packet parsing function. The undo nvme enable command disables the NVMe packet parsing function. By default, NVMe packet parsing is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
